items.title: Beat Procrastination Today: Time Management Masterclass
items.headline: Stop procrastinating! Boost your motivation & overcome procrastination with Burn Your Boats and Kanban Boards
objectives_summary: A step by step blueprint for getting back on top of your day and focusing on your tasks
The burn the boats technique of committing publicly to an outcome to get it done
Kanban boards for visualising workflow and prioritising in-progress tasks

items.title: MindMeister for Personal Productivity (Mind Mapping)
items.headline: Learn how mind mapping with MindMeister can help to manage and improve your productivity!
objectives_summary: Understand the principles of effective mind mapping
Learn key MindMeister functions, and how to use them in practical contexts
Use MindMeister with confidence to manage tasks and time

items.title: Pursue Your Purpose
items.headline: Live a Purposeful Life
objectives_summary: Pursue your Purpose course will help learners to discover and pursue their purpose in life. learners will be able to align their talents, gifts and skills with their passions and focus their efforts. This course will help learners to be purpose-driven rather than chase money and quick fixes in life. Pursuing one’s purpose comes along with fulfillment in life and irreversible success.

items.title: Paper Organization - Tame the Paper Clutter
items.headline: Discover ways of maintaining paper systems, tips for going paperless, and keeping paper organized!
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you will have built a plan to get started on Decluttering your paper.
You will enjoy feeling inspired and empowered to take control of the paper in your life.
You will have the ability to use a tested system to design a paper system that works for you.

items.title: Time Management for Animators
items.headline: Learn to manage time budgets and be able to have time to learn and practice animation
objectives_summary: You will learn how to manage time budgets and manage your time
You will be able to do more things in less time, being more productive

items.title: Learn How to Self-Coach: Achieve Any Result You Want
items.headline: Coach yourself for results with this simple, bite-size, step-by-step, and strategy filled Self - Coaching - program
objectives_summary: Learn how to be your own coach, save Time & Money
Learn from a "Grey Hair" in Coaching
Eliminate fear of change by learning effective step-by-step strategies

items.title: 5 Stones: Goal Setting & Achievement Intensive
items.headline: Goal setting is easy. Goal achievement is difficult... Until now. Learn a new process for getting the results you want.
objectives_summary: Learn a new approach to goal setting
Apply a 5 step process for achievement of your goals
Stay focused and on fire about what you want to accomplish

items.title: Create a Getting Things Done System & Increase Productivity
items.headline: Learn how to use the Getting Things Done system & increase your productivity with Pens and Paper, Files and Folders
objectives_summary: Implement a complete Getting Things Done System

Use the Getting Things Done system both at home and work
